title: Edit an enterprise asset subtype
content:
You can edit an enterprise asset subtype record to add new information or change existing information.

You can edit multiple records simultaneously by selecting them in the grid and updating them in the Preview pane on the right. For more information, see Mass update.

  1. From the main menu, select Build >Service Asset & Configuration> Enterprise Asset Subtypes.

  2. Select the enterprise asset subtype record you want to edit.

    To filter the record list, click the Add filter  button. For more information, see Filters.

  3. Click the record identifier in the Id column to display the selected record.

  4. By default, the enterprise asset subtype record is displayed with the General tab selected. Click the tab you want to edit or view.

    Tab Description
    General Displays details of the selected record. For more information, see the General tab section.
    Workflow Displays the workflow metaphase and phase for the selected enterprise asset. For more information about workflows, see Enterprise asset subtype workflow.
    History Displays changes to the selected record. For more information about history, see History.

  5. Save your changes.

General tab

Field Description
Display label External (common) name of the enterprise asset subtype.
Process type Type of the enterprise asset process, including Full Ownership, Consumable, and Stationary.
Image Upload an image which will be displayed on the Service Portal as an icon. The recommended image size is no less than 100 x 100 pixels in square shape.
